alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis; Lawrence (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 12:06PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Lawrence and northwestern Jefferson Davis Counties through 100 PM CST... At 1206 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monticello, or 21 miles south of Pinola, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Progress around 1215 PM CST. Prentiss around 1225 PM CST. Clem around 1240 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include New Hebron and Silver Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for south central and southeastern Mississippi.
